name: Soc-Kitty
description:
You ever woke up and told yourself, 'Ah yes, I feel like I must take on the role of a cat that only has legs that is trying to knock off objects on a table with a small soccer ball'? No? Well now you're here, so go off and knock things off the table as thigh cat!

CREDITS:

Dexter Knaack

Dominick Tamras

Ina "Chookatten" Sablan

Jeron "Jeronimo" Artest

Justin "jkorn" Korn

Katie Zhao

(Made for the 2021 BCI Game Jam!) https://bcigamejam.com/pages/eventDetails.html
